item.title: Aloe Jojoba Conditioning Rinse
item.dc:creator: smartikastore
item.description:
Description & Purpose:

Aloe-Jojoba Conditioning Rinse enriched formula with vitamin B complex and hydrolysed protein has extra moisturising power to leave your hair soft, shiny and manageable.

Designed to be used after our Aloe-Jojoba Shampoo, we have created an Aloe-Jojoba Conditioning Rinse that cares for your hair gently and effectively. The unique combination of stabilised aloe vera gel and jojoba, an agent to remove electrostatic charges, conditions the hair to give it a feeling of freshness and a look of silky elegance.

Give your hair that salon look and feel with the pH-balanced conditioning treatment of Aloe-Jojoba Conditioning Rinse.

The International Aloe Science Council Seal of Approval on each tube is another sign that this product is in a class of its own when it comes to hair care.

Contents:?296ml (10fl oz). Use within 12 months of opening.

Directions:

After shampooing with Aloe-Jojoba Shampoo, massage Aloe-Jojoba Conditioning Rinse into the hair and leave on for 2 to 3 minutes. Rinse hair thoroughly and dry.

Product Tips:

Aloe-Jojoba Conditioner is great used instead of gel when shaving your legs. There is no irritation and your legs are left lovely and silky smooth.

80 in stock

The post Aloe Jojoba Conditioning Rinse appeared first on Smartika Shop.
item.content:encoded:
The benefits of Aloe-Jojoba Conditioner:
  • pH-balanced
  • Highly concentrated (use sparingly)
  • Improved formula for superior manageability
  • Suitable for all hair types
  • Leaves hair soft, shiny and manageable

The post Aloe Jojoba Conditioning Rinse appeared first on Smartika Shop.

item.title: Aloe Jojoba Shampoo
item.dc:creator: smartikastore
item.description:
Leave your hair shiny, soft and manageable with this pH-balanced, pure aloe formula. Stabilised aloe vera gel benefits not only your hair, but your scalp as well. The gel's ingredients make it a natural alternative to other shampoos, while its gentle, concentrated formula makes it suitable for all hair types.

Helping to maintain healthy hair and scalp, its enzymatic activity sloughs-off dead cells. With the added benefits of stabilised aloe vera gel:

  • pH balanced
  • Mild cleansing shampoo
  • Relieves irritation of most scalp conditions
  • Suitable for all hair types
  • Concentrated (use sparingly)
  • It strengthens with aloe amino acids, matching the amino acids in hair follicles and papillae.
  • It supplies saponins and natural sudsing agents to fortify hair and give it body.

Forever Aloe-Jojoba Shampoo, a mild product capable of cleaning the oiliest hair, helps remove flakes and soothes the scalp, leaving your hair shiny and manageable.

Contents: 296ml (10fl oz).

Directions:

Apply to wet hair and massage to stimulate the scalp and create a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly. If needed, repeat procedure and rinse until hair is thoroughly clean.

80 in stock

The post Aloe Jojoba Shampoo appeared first on Smartika Shop.
